2 Base #

2.1 Globals #

Default global settings

∗, ∗:after, ∗:before {
    .box-sizing(border-box);
}
∗ > ∗:last-child {
    margin-bottom: 0;
}

2.2 Type #

Example

Heading 1

Heading 2

Heading 3

Heading 4

Heading 5

Paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Necessitatibus consectetur, non mollitia, doloribus magnam, molestias voluptatum rerum eaque explicabo tempora recusandae deserunt odit. Dolorum quisquam rerum minus, ipsam doloribus illo.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
<h1>Heading 1</h1>
<h2>Heading 2</h2>
<h3>Heading 3</h3>
<h4>Heading 4</h4>
<h5>Heading 5</h5>
<p><strong>Paragraph:</strong> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Necessitatibus consectetur, non mollitia, doloribus magnam, molestias voluptatum rerum eaque explicabo tempora recusandae deserunt odit. Dolorum quisquam rerum minus, ipsam doloribus illo.</p>
<blockquote>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.</blockquote>

2.3 Variables #

2.3.1 Media queries #

@mobile ~'only screen and (max-width : 767px)'
@tablet ~'only screen and (min-width : 768px) and (max-width : 991px)'
@tabletUp ~'only screen and (min-width : 768px)'
@tabletDown ~'only screen and (max-width : 991px)'
@desktop ~'only screen and (min-width : 992px) and (max-width : 1199px)'
@desktopUp ~'only screen and (min-width : 992px)'
@desktopDown ~'only screen and (max-width : 1199px)'
@desktopBig ~'only screen and (min-width : 1200px)'

2.3.2 Widths #

@widthS 600px;
@widthM 800px;
@widthL 1050px;

2.4 Mixins #

2.4.1 .clearfix() #

Clearfix for float layouts. .clearfix for quick access.

2.4.2 .ellipsis() #

Hides overflowing texts. Element requires inline-block or block. .ellipsis for quick access.

2.4.3 .ir() #

Hides text. .ir for quick access.
